docs.text: saving private ryan ( dreamworks ) running time : 2 hours 48 minutes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: starring tom hanks , edward burns , tom sizemore and matt damon directed by steven spielberg already being hailed as the 'greatest war movie ever made , ' saving private ryan is an harrowing , saddening and riveting movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it may not be the greatest war movie in my opinion , but it's certainly one of the best war movies made , and one of the best of 1998 .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tom hanks stars as a captain who's troop has to find private ryan ( damon ) who has a ticket home because his three brothers have been killed in action .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: action , drama and even some humour occur as the troop journeys through wartime france to find him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after the disappointing amistad ( 1997 ) spielberg has returned to form with this excellent movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i'm not the war movie genre biggest fan , but i found this film to be gripping , and very scary , thanks to the excellent cast , direction and terrifying battle scenes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tom hanks is superb , straying away from his usually soppy dramatic roles , such as in forrest gump ( 1994 ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this time , he plays the role with gritty realism , and is much better for it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: occasionally he overacts the sentimentally , but he generally delivers a fine performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: edward burns , looking a lot like armageddon's ben affleck , also delivers a top notch performance , moving away from his roles in films such as she's the one ( 1996 ) tom sizemore makes less of an impact , but is still watchable , and matt damon reinforcing his position as one of the finest young actors working today .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: spielberg directs very well , putting the audience right in the heart of the action of the battle scenes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and what battle scenes they are !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they're truly terrifying , yet the audience cannot drag their eyes away from the screen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the battle scenes are filmed with a jerky hand-held camera , and the panic and confusion felt by the soldiers is emphasized by this technique .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the gore and violence isn't spared either , which body parts flying , and blood spurting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film is certainly not for kids and sensitive adults .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: other factors help saving private ryan be a masterpiece of 90's film making .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the cinematography is excellent , and the music score by john william's is also superb .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is never intrusive , and adds to the drama on-screen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but while they are thousands of good things great about private ryan , there's one major flaw that detracts the genius of the film : the writing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is unusually flat , with many of the speeches strangely weak .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film never really makes any profound statements .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is not a major gripe , as private ryan is a film of action , not words .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: still , the script could of been a lot better .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: thankfully , the actors help partly to rectify the situation with their great delivery of their lines .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: saving private ryan , in the end , is an excellent film , but not the 'greatest war movie' due to it's weak acting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this film should be viewed by everyone who has the stomach for it , as it's rewarding and extremely worthwhile .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it really shouldn't be missed , and dreamworks skg has finally found it's first hit movie .
docs.label: positive
